text: Mulholland Falls is a 1996 American neo-noir crime drama movie. It stars Nick Nolte. Melanie Griffith plays his wife Katherine Hoover, John Malkovich plays Thomas Timms, and Jennifer Connelly plays Allison Pond. The movie is set in the 1950s in Los Angeles. It is about different types of organized crimes happening in the area. This movie was released in April 1996 in the United States. The reviews were excellent. The box office intake was rather poor: the movie only got back almost $12 million, roughly half its budget of $29 million. title: Mulholland Falls
